java/liquibase/parser/xml/XMLChangeLogHandler.java

00001 package liquibase.parser.xml;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00005 import liquibase.FileOpener;
00006 import liquibase.change.*;
00007 import liquibase.change.custom.CustomChangeWrapper;
00008 import liquibase.exception.CustomChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException;
00010 import liquibase.exception.MigrationFailedException;
00011 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00012 import liquibase.parser.ChangeLogParser;
00013 import liquibase.preconditions.*;
00014 import liquibase.util.ObjectUtil;
00015 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00016 import org.xml.sax.Attributes;
00017 import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
00018 import org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler;
00019 
00020 import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
00021 import java.util.List;
00022 import java.util.Stack;
00023 import java.util.logging.Level;
00024 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00025 
00026 class XMLChangeLogHandler extends DefaultHandler {
00027 
00028     protected Logger log;
00029 
00030     private DatabaseChangeLog databaseChangeLog;
00031     private Change change;
00032     private StringBuffer text;
00033     private AndPrecondition rootPrecondition;
00034     private Stack<PreconditionLogic> preconditionLogicStack = new Stack<PreconditionLogic>();
00035     private ChangeSet changeSet;
00036     private FileOpener fileOpener;
00037     private Precondition currentPrecondition;
00038 
00039 
00040     protected XMLChangeLogHandler(String physicalChangeLogLocation, FileOpener fileOpener) {
00041         log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00042         this.fileOpener = fileOpener;
00043 
00044         databaseChangeLog = new DatabaseChangeLog(physicalChangeLogLocation);
00045         databaseChangeLog.setPhysicalFilePath(physicalChangeLogLocation);
00046     }
00047 
00048     public DatabaseChangeLog getDatabaseChangeLog() {
00049         return databaseChangeLog;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public void startElement(String uri, String localName, String qName, Attributes atts) throws SAXException {
00053         try {
00054             if ("comment".equals(qName)) {
00055                 text = new StringBuffer();
00056             } else if ("databaseChangeLog".equals(qName)) {
00057                 String version = uri.substring(uri.lastIndexOf("/")+1);
00058                 if (!version.equals(XMLChangeLogParser.getSchemaVersion())) {
00059                     log.warning(databaseChangeLog.getPhysicalFilePath()+" is using schema version "+version+" rather than version "+XMLChangeLogParser.getSchemaVersion());
00060                 }
00061                 databaseChangeLog.setLogicalFilePath(atts.getValue("logicalFilePath"));
00062             } else if ("include".equals(qName)) {
00063                 String fileName = atts.getValue("file");
00064                 handleIncludedChangeLog(fileName);
00065             } else if (changeSet == null && "changeSet".equals(qName)) {
00066                 boolean alwaysRun = false;
00067                 boolean runOnChange = false;
00068                 if ("true".equalsIgnoreCase(atts.getValue("runAlways"))) {
00069                     alwaysRun = true;
00070                 }
00071                 if ("true".equalsIgnoreCase(atts.getValue("runOnChange"))) {
00072                     runOnChange = true;
00073                 }
00074                 changeSet = new ChangeSet(atts.getValue("id"),
00075                         atts.getValue("author"),
00076                         alwaysRun,
00077                         runOnChange,
00078                         databaseChangeLog.getFilePath(),
00079                         databaseChangeLog.getPhysicalFilePath(),
00080                         atts.getValue("context"),
00081                         atts.getValue("dbms"));
00082                 if (StringUtils.trimToNull(atts.getValue("failOnError")) != null) {
00083                     changeSet.setFailOnError(Boolean.parseBoolean(atts.getValue("failOnError")));
00084                 }
00085             } else if (changeSet != null && "rollback".equals(qName)) {
00086                 text = new StringBuffer();
00087             } else if (changeSet != null && change == null) {
00088                 change = ChangeFactory.getInstance().create(qName);
00089                 change.setChangeSet(changeSet);
00090                 text = new StringBuffer();
00091                 if (change == null) {
00092                     throw new MigrationFailedException(changeSet, "Unknown change: " + qName);
00093                 }
00094                 change.setFileOpener(fileOpener);
00095                 if (change instanceof CustomChangeWrapper) {
00096                     ((CustomChangeWrapper) change).setClassLoader(fileOpener.toClassLoader());
00097                 }
00098                 for (int i = 0; i < atts.getLength(); i++) {
00099                     String attributeName = atts.getQName(i);
00100                     String attributeValue = atts.getValue(i);
00101                     setProperty(change, attributeName, attributeValue);
00102                 }
00103                 change.setUp();
00104             } else if (change != null && "column".equals(qName)) {
00105                 ColumnConfig column = new ColumnConfig();
00106                 for (int i = 0; i < atts.getLength(); i++) {
00107                     String attributeName = atts.getQName(i);
00108                     String attributeValue = atts.getValue(i);
00109                     setProperty(column, attributeName, attributeValue);
00110                 }
00111                 if (change instanceof AddColumnChange) {
00112                     ((AddColumnChange) change).addColumn(column);
00113                 } else if (change instanceof CreateTableChange) {
00114                     ((CreateTableChange) change).addColumn(column);
00115                 } else if (change instanceof InsertDataChange) {
00116                     ((InsertDataChange) change).addColumn(column);
00117                 } else if (change instanceof UpdateDataChange) {
00118                     ((UpdateDataChange) change).addColumn(column);
00119                 } else if (change instanceof CreateIndexChange) {
00120                     ((CreateIndexChange) change).addColumn(column);
00121                 } else if (change instanceof ModifyColumnChange) {
00122                     ((ModifyColumnChange) change).addColumn(column);
00123                 } else {
00124                     throw new RuntimeException("Unexpected column tag for " + change.getClass().getName());
00125                 }
00126             } else if (change != null && "constraints".equals(qName)) {
00127                 ConstraintsConfig constraints = new ConstraintsConfig();
00128                 for (int i = 0; i < atts.getLength(); i++) {
00129                     String attributeName = atts.getQName(i);
00130                     String attributeValue = atts.getValue(i);
00131                     setProperty(constraints, attributeName, attributeValue);
00132                 }
00133                 ColumnConfig lastColumn;
00134                 if (change instanceof AddColumnChange) {
00135                     lastColumn = ((AddColumnChange) change).getLastColumn();
00136                 } else if (change instanceof CreateTableChange) {
00137                     lastColumn = ((CreateTableChange) change).getColumns().get(((CreateTableChange) change).getColumns().size() - 1);
00138                 } else {
00139                     throw new RuntimeException("Unexpected change: " + change.getClass().getName());
00140                 }
00141                 lastColumn.setConstraints(constraints);
00142             } else if ("preConditions".equals(qName)) {
00143                 rootPrecondition = new AndPrecondition();
00144                 preconditionLogicStack.push(rootPrecondition);
00145 
00146             } else if (rootPrecondition != null) {
00147                 currentPrecondition = PreconditionFactory.getInstance().create(qName);
00148 
00149                 for (int i = 0; i < atts.getLength(); i++) {
00150                     String attributeName = atts.getQName(i);
00151                     String attributeValue = atts.getValue(i);
00152                     setProperty(currentPrecondition, attributeName, attributeValue);
00153                 }
00154                 preconditionLogicStack.peek().addNestedPrecondition(currentPrecondition);
00155 
00156                 if (currentPrecondition instanceof PreconditionLogic) {
00157                     preconditionLogicStack.push(((PreconditionLogic) currentPrecondition));
00158                 }
00159 
00160                 if ("sqlCheck".equals(qName)) {
00161                     text = new StringBuffer();
00162                 }
00163             } else if ("param".equals(qName)) {
00164                 if (change instanceof CustomChangeWrapper) {
00165                     ((CustomChangeWrapper) change).setParam(atts.getValue("name"), atts.getValue("value"));
00166                 } else {
00167                     throw new MigrationFailedException(changeSet, "'param' unexpected in " + qName);
00168                 }
00169             } else if ("where".equals(qName)) {
00170                 text = new StringBuffer();
00171             } else if (change instanceof ExecuteShellCommandChange && "arg".equals(qName)) {
00172                 ((ExecuteShellCommandChange) change).addArg(atts.getValue("value"));
00173             } else {
00174                 throw new MigrationFailedException(changeSet, "Unexpected tag: " + qName);
00175             }
00176         } catch (Exception e) {
00177             log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error thrown as a SAXException: " + e.getMessage(), e);
00178             throw new SAXException(e);
00179         }
00180     }
00181 
00182     protected void handleIncludedChangeLog(String fileName) throws LiquibaseException {
00183         for (ChangeSet changeSet : new ChangeLogParser().parse(fileName, fileOpener).getChangeSets()) {
00184             databaseChangeLog.addChangeSet(changeSet);
00185         }
00186     }
00187 
00188     private void setProperty(Object object, String attributeName, String attributeValue) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, CustomChangeException {
00189         if (object instanceof CustomChangeWrapper) {
00190             if (attributeName.equals("class")) {
00191                 ((CustomChangeWrapper) object).setClass(attributeValue);
00192             } else {
00193                 ((CustomChangeWrapper) object).setParam(attributeName, attributeValue);
00194             }
00195         } else {
00196             ObjectUtil.setProperty(object, attributeName, attributeValue);
00197         }
00198     }
00199 
00200     public void endElement(String uri, String localName, String qName) throws SAXException {
00201         String textString = null;
00202         if (text != null && text.length() > 0) {
00203             textString = StringUtils.trimToNull(text.toString());
00204         }
00205 
00206         try {
00207             if (rootPrecondition != null) {
00208                 if ("preConditions".equals(qName)) {
00209                     databaseChangeLog.setPreconditions(rootPrecondition);
00210                     handlePreCondition(rootPrecondition);
00211                     rootPrecondition = null;
00212                 } else if ("and".equals(qName)) {
00213                     preconditionLogicStack.pop();
00214                     currentPrecondition = null;
00215                 } else if ("or".equals(qName)) {
00216                     preconditionLogicStack.pop();
00217                     currentPrecondition = null;
00218                 } else if ("not".equals(qName)) {
00219                     preconditionLogicStack.pop();
00220                     currentPrecondition = null;
00221                 } else if (qName.equals("sqlCheck")) {
00222                     ((SqlPrecondition) currentPrecondition).setSql(textString);
00223                     currentPrecondition = null;
00224                 }
00225 
00226             } else if (changeSet != null && "rollback".equals(qName)) {
00227                 changeSet.setRollBackSQL(textString);
00228             } else if (change != null && change instanceof RawSQLChange && "comment".equals(qName)) {
00229                 ((RawSQLChange) change).setComments(textString);
00230                 text = new StringBuffer();
00231             } else if (change != null && "where".equals(qName)) {
00232                 if (change instanceof UpdateDataChange) {
00233                     ((UpdateDataChange) change).setWhereClause(textString);
00234                 } else if (change instanceof DeleteDataChange) {
00235                     ((DeleteDataChange) change).setWhereClause(textString);
00236                 } else {
00237                     throw new RuntimeException("Unexpected change type: "+change.getClass().getName());
00238                 }
00239                 text = new StringBuffer();
00240             } else if (change != null && change instanceof CreateProcedureChange && "comment".equals(qName)) {
00241                 ((CreateProcedureChange) change).setComments(textString);
00242                 text = new StringBuffer();
00243             } else if (changeSet != null && "comment".equals(qName)) {
00244                 changeSet.setComments(textString);
00245                 text = new StringBuffer();
00246             } else if (changeSet != null && "changeSet".equals(qName)) {
00247                 handleChangeSet(changeSet);
00248                 changeSet = null;
00249             } else if (change != null && qName.equals(change.getTagName())) {
00250                 if (textString != null) {
00251                     if (change instanceof RawSQLChange) {
00252                         ((RawSQLChange) change).setSql(textString);
00253                     } else if (change instanceof CreateProcedureChange) {
00254                         ((CreateProcedureChange) change).setProcedureBody(textString);
00255                     } else if (change instanceof CreateViewChange) {
00256                         ((CreateViewChange) change).setSelectQuery(textString);
00257                     } else if (change instanceof InsertDataChange) {
00258                         List<ColumnConfig> columns = ((InsertDataChange) change).getColumns();
00259                         columns.get(columns.size() - 1).setValue(textString);
00260                     } else if (change instanceof UpdateDataChange) {
00261                         List<ColumnConfig> columns = ((UpdateDataChange) change).getColumns();
00262                         columns.get(columns.size() - 1).setValue(textString);
00263                     } else {
00264                         throw new RuntimeException("Unexpected text in " + change.getTagName());
00265                     }
00266                 }
00267                 text = null;
00268                 changeSet.addChange(change);
00269                 change = null;
00270             }
00271         } catch (Exception e) {
00272             log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error thrown as a SAXException: " + e.getMessage(), e);
00273             throw new SAXException(databaseChangeLog.getPhysicalFilePath() + ": " + e.getMessage(), e);
00274         }
00275     }
00276 
00277     protected void handlePreCondition(@SuppressWarnings("unused")Precondition precondition) {
00278         databaseChangeLog.setPreconditions(rootPrecondition);
00279     }
00280 
00281     protected void handleChangeSet(ChangeSet changeSet) {
00282         databaseChangeLog.addChangeSet(changeSet);
00283     }
00284 
00285     public void characters(char ch[], int start, int length) throws SAXException {
00286         if (text != null) {
00287             text.append(new String(ch, start, length));
00288         }
00289     }
